name: Pyke
title: the Bloodharbor Ripper

P.name: Gift of the Drowned Ones

effects.description: Innate: Pyke's maximum health cannot increase except through growth (per level), instead he gains[ 1 bonus attack damage per 14 bonus health. ][ (7.143% bonus health) bonus attack damage. ]

Pyke also stores 10% (+ 0.25% per 1 Lethality) of the damage he takes from enemy champions as Grey Health on his health bar, increased to 35% (+ 0.5% per 1 Lethality) if there are two or more visible enemy champions nearby and storing up to 80 (+ 800% bonus AD) Grey Health, with an upper cap of 60% of his maximum health.
When Pyke is not visible to enemies, he rapidly consumes his Grey Health to heal for the same amount.
Pyke gains 1 bonus movement speed while in the river.

P.notes:
Game elements that increase health based on the champion's health (e.g  Overgrowth) will increase the health before getting converted by Gift of the Drowned Ones, thus granting increased bonus AD.
 Spirit Visage and  Grievous Wounds take effect after Gift of the Drowned Ones's healing cap.
Pyke's Grey Health does not have a time limit, and will stay on his health bar until Pyke leaves enemy vision or dies.
Since Pyke's maximum health cannot be increased, Gift of the Drowned Ones reaches the upper cap of 60% of maximum health at 35 − 149.75 (based on level) bonus attack damage.
 Untargetable champions count towards Pyke's modified Grey Health storing.
The maximum amount of additional Grey Health storing gained possible from all lethality sources is 69.5% at 139 lethality. This is reduced to 34.75% while there are fewer than two enemy champions nearby.
Relevant mathematics:
 Prowler's Claw: + 10.5% health storing, reduced to 5.25% for fewer than two enemy champions nearby
 Sandshrike's Claw: + 14.5% health storing, reduced to 7.25% for fewer than two enemy champions nearby
Maximum Mythic Passive Bonuses: + 12.5% health storing, reduced to 6.25% for fewer than two enemy champions nearby
 Duskblade of Draktharr: + 9% health storing, reduced to 4.5% for fewer than two enemy champions nearby
 Draktharr's Shadowcarver: + 13% health storing, reduced to 6.5% for fewer than two enemy champions nearby
 Eclipse: + 9% health storing, reduced to 4.5% for fewer than two enemy champions nearby
 Syzygy: + 13% health storing, reduced to 6.5% for fewer than two enemy champions nearby
 Sanguine Blade: + 9% health storing while Frenzy is active, reduced to 4.5% for fewer than two enemy champions nearby
+ 5% health storing while Frenzy is inactive, reduced to 2.5% for fewer than two enemy champions nearby
 Serpent's Fang: + 9% health storing, reduced to 4.5% for fewer than two enemy champions nearby
 Youmuu's Ghostblade: + 9% health storing, reduced to 4.5% for fewer than two enemy champions nearby
 The Collector: + 6% health storing, reduced to 3% for fewer than two enemy champions nearby
 Umbral Glaive: + 6% health storing, reduced to 3% for fewer than two enemy champions nearby
 Edge of Night: + 5% health storing, reduced to 2.5% for fewer than two enemy champions nearby
 Serrated Dirk: + 5% health storing, reduced to 2.5% for fewer than two enemy champions nearby
 Sudden Impact: + 3.5% health storing, reduced to 1.75% for fewer than two enemy champions nearby
Total Increased Percent:  14.5% + 12.5% +  9% +  9% +  9% +  6% +  6% +  3.5% = 69.5% health storing
Total Health Storing: 69.5% + 35% = 104.5%

Q.name: Bone Skewer

effects.description: Active: Pyke charges while being slowed by 20% for up to 3 seconds to increase Bone Skewer's range over the first second of the channel. Bone Skewer can be recast at any time within its duration.

Recast: Pyke hurls his harpoon in the target direction, dealing physical damage to the first enemy struck, pulling them towards his direction, during which they are also revealed, and slowing them by 90% for 1 second.

Releasing the ability within 0.4 seconds causes Pyke to instead thrust his blade in the target direction, dealing the same damage to the closest enemy champion, or closest enemy if no champion is hit.
If Pyke is interrupted during the charge, or the charge completes without reactivation, Bone Skewer is cancelled and the ability is put on full cooldown but half of its mana cost is refunded.

Q.notes:
Only the charged version of Bone Skewer will be  intercepted.
 Flash can be used during the cast time and Bone Skewer will affect enemies at the new location.
Pyke can still use summoner spells besides  Flash,  Teleport,  Hexflash, and  Mark /  Dash while hurling the harpoon but he cannot perform any other action.

W.name: Ghostwater Dive

effects.description: Active: Pyke submerges into water, entering camouflage for 5 seconds and gaining 40% (+ 1.5% per 1 Lethality) bonus movement speed that decays over the duration. Enemies are notified if Pyke is within 1500 units of them.
Attacking or casting abilities immediately ends Ghostwater Dive.

W.notes:
When Pyke is hidden nearby in his Ghostwater Dive, sharks will circle underneath nearby enemies' feet and a sound will be played, changing based on the amount of health they have left.
Enemies will hear a warning tone if their health bar is under the threshold of  Death from Below.
The maximum amount of  bonus movement speed gained possible from all lethality sources is 208.5% at 139 lethality.
Relevant mathematics:
 Prowler's Claw: + 31.5% bonus MS
 Sandshrike's Claw: + 43.5% bonus MS
Maximum Mythic Passive Bonuses: + 37.5% bonus MS
 Duskblade of Draktharr: + 27% bonus MS
 Draktharr's Shadowcarver: + 39% bonus MS
 Eclipse: + 27% bonus MS
 Syzygy: + 39% bonus MS
 Sanguine Blade: + 27% bonus MS while Frenzy is active
+ 15% bonus MS while Frenzy is inactive
 Serpent's Fang: + 27% bonus MS
 Youmuu's Ghostblade: + 27% bonus MS
 The Collector: + 18% bonus MS
 Umbral Glaive: + 18% bonus MS
 Edge of Night: + 15% bonus MS
 Serrated Dirk: + 15% bonus MS
 Sudden Impact: + 10.5% bonus MS
Total Increased Percent:  43.5% + 37.5% +  27% +  27% +  27% +  18% +  18% +  10.5% = 208.5% bonus MS
Total Bonus Movement Speed: 208.5% + 40% = 248.5%

E.name: Phantom Undertow

effects.description: Active: Pyke dashes a fixed distance in the target direction, leaving behind a Phantom for 1 second.
Afterwards, the Phantom returns to Pyke, stunning enemies around it and those it passes through along the way for 1.25 (+ 0.1 per 10 Lethality) seconds. Enemy champions also take physical damage.

E.notes:
The  dash distance can be extended to up to 900 units (estimated) when targeting across terrain.
Like most projectiles, the flying Phantom cannot hit targets whose  center is behind the position it originates at or beyond the position it catches up to Pyke at, but the spell can hit targets behind its origin as long as their  hitbox radius overlaps with the original unit Phantom's 110-radius check at the end of its lifespan.
The maximum increase in  stun duration possible from all lethality sources is 1.39 seconds at 139 lethality, with the base duration included for a total of 2.64 seconds.
Relevant mathematics:
 Prowler's Claw: + 0.21 seconds
 Sandshrike's Claw: + 0.29 seconds
Maximum Mythic Passive Bonuses: + 0.25 seconds
 Duskblade of Draktharr: + 0.18 seconds
 Draktharr's Shadowcarver: + 0.26 seconds
 Eclipse: + 0.18 seconds
 Syzygy: + 0.26 seconds
 Sanguine Blade: + 0.18 seconds while Frenzy is active
+ 0.10 seconds while Frenzy is inactive
 Serpent's Fang: + 0.18 seconds
 Youmuu's Ghostblade: + 0.18 seconds
 The Collector: + 0.12 seconds
 Umbral Glaive: + 0.12 seconds
 Edge of Night: + 0.10 seconds
 Serrated Dirk: + 0.10 seconds
 Sudden Impact: + 0.07 seconds
Total Increased Duration:  0.29 + 0.25 +  0.18 +  0.18 +  0.18 +  0.12 +  0.12 +  0.07 = 1.39 seconds
Total Stun Duration: 1.39 + 1.25 = 2.64 seconds

R.name: Death from Below

effects.description: Active: Pyke marks the target location with an X before striking it, executing enemy champions within the area that are below 250 − 550 (based on level) (+ 80% bonus AD) (+ 1.5 per 1 Lethality) health while dealing[ 50% of the amount as physical damage ][ 125 − 275 (based on level) (+ 40% bonus AD) (+ 0.75 per 1 Lethality) physical damage ]to non-champion enemies and enemy champions within not in the threshold for execution.
If Death from Below hits an enemy champion or one dies inside it, Pyke will blink to the center of the X. For the latter case Pyke also gains the ability to recast within 20 seconds at no cost.

Each execution grants one 'Your Cut' to both Pyke and the last assisting ally, instead of its natural assist gold. In addition, each enemy champion killed inside the X by an ally grants Pyke two stacks of 'Your Cut'.

R.notes:
Applies  raw damage to executed targets and  area damage to targets above the threshold.
Death from Below cannot execute  clones. They are always dealt 50% physical damage.
Only the target's current health will count as Pyke's damage in post-game statistics and  spell vamp healing if executed.
If the target's current health is less than 50% of the post-mitigation non-executing damage, Pyke will heal less from spell vamp.
If the target is saved by  resurrection or is in a  zombie state, Death from Below does not grant  'Your Cut' nor the recast.
 Spell shield does not prevent Pyke from  blinking.
If an enemy champion dies inside the X before Death from Below performs, Pyke will be shown as having received an assist in the kill feed, but this will not grant him  takedown effects.
Death from Below cannot be  interrupted; Pyke will always appear at the target location if enemy champions are caught inside the X even if he is moved (e.g. by being  displaced) during the cast time.
The only exception is if he is being  suppressed, in which case he will not  blink.
The maximum execution threshold increase gained possible from all lethality sources is 208.5 health at 139 lethality.
Relevant mathematics:
 Prowler's Claw: + 31.5 health
 Sandshrike's Claw: + 43.5 health
Maximum Mythic Passive Bonuses: + 37.5 health
 Duskblade of Draktharr: + 27 health
 Draktharr's Shadowcarver: + 39 health
 Eclipse: + 27 health
 Syzygy: + 39 health
 Sanguine Blade: + 27 health while Frenzy is active
+ 15 health while Frenzy is inactive
 Serpent's Fang: + 27 health
 Youmuu's Ghostblade: + 27 health
 The Collector: + 18 health
 Umbral Glaive: + 18 health
 Edge of Night: + 15 health
 Serrated Dirk: + 15 health
 Sudden Impact: + 10.5 health
Total Increased Execution Threshold:  43.5 + 37.5 +  27 +  27 +  27 +  18 +  18 +  10.5 = 208.5 health
Total Execution Threshold: 208.5 + 250 − 550 (based on level) (+ 80% bonus AD) = 458.5 − 758.5 (based on level) (+ 80% bonus AD)

lore: A renowned harpooner from the slaughter docks of Bilgewater, Pyke should have met his death in the belly of a gigantic jaull-fish… and yet, he returned. Now, stalking the dank alleys and backways of his former hometown, he uses his new supernatural gifts to bring a swift and gruesome end to those who make their fortune by exploiting others—and a city that prides itself on hunting monsters now finds a monster hunting them.

skins.name: Original
skins.lore: Rrenowned harpooner from the slaughter docks of Bilgewater, Pyke should have met his death in the belly of a gigantic jaull-fish… and yet, he returned. Now, stalking the dank alleys and backways of his former hometown, he uses his new supernatural gifts to bring a swift and gruesome end to those who make their fortune by exploiting others—and a city that prides itself on hunting monsters now finds a monster hunting them.

skins.name: Sand Wraith
skins.lore: The vengeful ghost of an ancient caravan master betrayed by his guards, Pyke now lurks within the golden halls of the desert's remaining city-states. He hunts anyone and everyone who attracts his gaze, claiming they all condemned him to death.

skins.name: Blood Moon

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during 2019.

skins.lore: A demonic spearfisher lurking within the darkness of the Blood Moon's mirror dimension, Pyke casts his hooked blade across an endless, liquid night, dragging demons up from the bottom of the world and into their human hosts. Inexorably tied to the Blood Moon, Pyke's sudden appearance in Ionia is a dire omen indeed…

skins.name: PROJECT

descriptions.description: Loot exclusive gained during the 2019 PROJECT event.
This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2019.

skins.lore: An early PROJECT prototype, Pyke's untested upgrades left him violently unstable—too much so for his handlers, who junked him and threw his remains outside the walls of the City. Yet his cybernetic brain survived, rebuilding Pyke with salvaged scrap parts from all around him, and now their fragmented, overlapping memories mix with his own as they scream out for revenge.

skins.name: PsyOps

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2020 PsyOps event.
This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

skins.lore: A member of the Black Rose Group's leadership and a powerful spiritual medium, Pyke's mastery of psychic power allows him to jump across the barrier separating the living and the dead. This process has slowly eaten at his mind, leaving him a half-deranged killer screaming at literal ghosts.
